name: Backwoods (Louis McTague)
description:
Explore the backwoods to find an ancient castle containing millions in golden treasures. Use your critical thinking to solve puzzles, process through the castle, and find the hidden treasure within!

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Camera Look

Mouse Left Button-  (Hold) Pick up rock / (Click) Open gate

Spacebar - Jump

Escape or P - Pause
